title: Finding tanx
text: $$tanx=$$ length of opposite $$\frac{leg}{length}$$ of adjacent leg
speech: tanx is equal to  length of opposite , fraction, l e g, over length,   of adjacent leg
pacedSpeech: length of opposite  , fraction, l e g, over length,

title: Lengths
text: The length of the leg opposite of A is $$a=4$$, the length of the leg adjacent to A is $$b=5.7$$, and the length of the hypotenuse is $$c=7$$.
speech: The length of the leg opposite of A is  a is equal to 4 , the length of the leg adjacent to A is  b, is equal to 5.7 , and the length of the hypotenuse is  c, is equal to 7 .

, the length of the leg adjacent to A is   b, is equal to 5.7
, and the length of the hypotenuse is   c, is equal to 7
